mng: to press, to push, to leave aside or shelve, to control, to restrain, to keep one's hand on, to check or refer to, according to, in the light of, (of an editor or author) to make a comment

exm.mng: according to, in accordance with, in the light of, on the basis of
on time, before deadline, on schedule
to follow the prescribed order; to keep to the working routine (idiom)
according to reason, in the ordinary course of events, normally
